author: Monica Sisavat
title: Paris Jackson's Birthday Message For Brother Blanket 2017 | POPSUGAR Celebrity
text:
Paris Jackson's Birthday Message For Brother Blanket 2017 Paris Jackson Shares a Precious Throwback Snap of Her and Brother Blanket For His Birthday February 21, 2017 A post shared by Paris-Michael K. Jackson (@parisjackson) on Feb 21, 2017 at 1:47pm PST 
Michael Jackson's youngest son, Blanket (born Prince Michael Jackson II), turned 15 years old on Tuesday, and his sister Paris shared a heartfelt message for him via Instagram. The 18-year-old posted a throwback photo of the two , writing, "Ug my little man is 15 today. slow the f*ck down, i want you to stay a baby forever ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ this lil dude right here is one of the most strong, intelligent, and determined people i know. watching you grow up and slowly become a man is like super terrifying but i honestly can't tell you how proud i am. i love you so much B." Paris clearly has a lot to celebrate lately. Just last week, Paris posted a childhood photo of her and older brother Prince Michael in honor of his 20th birthday. Related:
